description:
Technical liner socks ideal for pairing with a heavier sock in cold conditions, the Snow Liner Over the Calf socks are durable, stretchy, and highly breathable. The ultralight, uncushioned design features a blend of merino wool, nylon, and LYCRA® with key support zones in the ankle, Achilles, and instep. The seamless toe reduces bulk and prevents blisters.

Inspired by nature, icebreaker harnesses the performance qualities of natural fibers to offer an alternative to clothing based on petrochemical synthetics. Merino is an annually renewable fiber that naturally resists odors, keeps you cool when it’s hot and warm when it’s not, and lets your skin breathe for comfort all day, every day.
name: Icebreaker Snow Liner Over The Calf Socks - Light Cushion - Mens

specs.value: 61% Merino Wool, 37% Nylon, 2% LYCRA® - Exclusive of decoration
